website_summaries.verdict: A solid two-tier plant stand in a contemporary style. A high-quality product with a sturdy and sleek design.
pros: Looks great, but its simple design doesn't take away from your plants
The strong curves are well-worked and attract the eye
Has a lot of weight to it, making it stable and durable
cons: May be unsuitable for use on very thick carpet due to distribution of weight

customer_reviews.title: All Pros, No Cons!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!! I am thinking of buying another one!! I searched high and lo for a simple plant stand that wasn't ugly or metal. Amazon always has what I need! It arrived in perfect condition and all my husband had to do was assemble, which took no time at all!! The packaging was killer, Coaster definitely wanted to make sure nothing happened to the plant stand while in transit! Also, if someone was strapped for space, this plant stand could double as a bedside table (this would have come in handy when I lived in my condo!). I would DEFINITELY recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M. Dero

customer_reviews.title: Decent BUT INCORRECT color !!!
customer_reviews.text: Decent piece of furniture... looks nice etc.. you have to assemble it which is super easy with a simple screw driver and takes literally 2 minutes.... it seems sturdy..... BUT BEWARE it states the color as being cappuccino which like the rest of my furniture in that color is black... This stand is basically dark cherry..... there is nothing in my house that is dark cherry!!... SO as you can imagine I am very disappointed.....darn it !! so 3 stars for not being the color I needed..... if it had been some sort of shade of black then it would of been 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: Bill E

customer_reviews.title: Wellll
customer_reviews.text: Well, its nice wood, looks nice in the picture, wanted to use it upside down though, only prob, I am a senior and thought it was assembled already. Takes 2 ppl to put together (for me)so it's stll unassemled. Very pricey but it was a reduced warehouse price. YOU MIGHT LIKE IT THOUGH 😂
customer_reviews.author: Godzgrl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about this product for months. I am very pleased with this item. Simple to put together. Sturdy. Looks very nice with a plant on it and a flame less candle on the bottom. It's more of a red color than brown but fits perfectly in my dining room. It was packaged so well there was not a single dent, scratch, ding, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand or accent table.....but it is on the larger size.
customer_reviews.text: While this is listed as a plant stand, it is actually on the larger size. If space is limited, be sure that 18 inch diameter will fit in your location. If you are looking for a small accent table, it will be ideal as it is sturdy and looks nice. A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bertley

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this table. Dimensions were perfect for what I was looking for. Made very well. It's a beautiful cherry wood. So easy to assemble. It showcases one of my art pieces beautifully! Kudos to Coster Fine Furniture! They are what they advertise. Wish I had bought it sooner. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand looks exactly as portrayed in the picture, but it is not good quality. My first one came with a deep scratch and dent in the base piece. The rep was very nice and sent another base. This one also had a scratch on the base. This plant stand was packaged well, so the scratches and dents were on the piece before it was packaged. That should never have happened. I didn't even bother to replace it again. I won't order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Tarter

customer_reviews.title: You must assemble!
customer_reviews.text: It says in deail of product that there is no assembly. I probably would’t have bought it if the details were correct. It’s probably not hard for most people, but it was for me. It seens t be nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Really nice table at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to use as night stands in our guest room. Just the right size, and quite lovely for under $100 each. Couldn't even pay that at consignment! Only problem is that they are a little top-heavy, and not stable on our carpeting. They would be perfect on hard floors though, and thats how I would recommend you use them. They even come with plastic "feet" to prevent scratching hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: twin cities nature girl

customer_reviews.title: Premium Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: I choose this stand because I had two plant that I needed to get off the floor. I looked at other but the design of this one caught my eye. The curved legs give it a nice touch in the corner. It look expensive but the price wasn't. It is a nice color almost looks mahogany. Great little plant stand.
customer_reviews.author: Born to Impress

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive stand for my vase
customer_reviews.text: Needed for a huge vase and perfect. Have a needle point covered BRICK - very pretty that I put in bottom because it is light weight
customer_reviews.author: Virginia D

customer_reviews.title: As advertised plant stand/end table
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand arrived on time. It was easy to put together. It seems ver sturdy. I am using it as an end table rather than a plant stand. It didn't get five stars because it was not made of very high quality would. You can tell that by the uneven stain. That said, it serves my purpose very well and I order d another to have a pair.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Quality accent table - looks lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Great side or accent table. Easy to put together and sturdy. Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: This Plant Stand is everything I was looking for. It has an expensive look which is what I was looking for. The wood is dark which matches the mahogany table I have in the room. It can hold a substantially heavy plant without tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy plant stand that is solid and attractive. Not difficult to assemble. Available from several Amazon sellers and others at prices that vary widely. Direct from Amazon (not an Amazon merchant) seemed best price by large margin. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table!! It looks fantastic in my living room with a vase and flowers on it. Seriously thinking about buying a matching one. It was extremely easy to assemble and came nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: humming

customer_reviews.title: classic!
customer_reviews.text: As with all things that need building I was full of trepidation about putting this together. I need not have worried it went together and was complete in 15 mins. Marvellous! Not only that but it looks really good and very classic.! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. Y. from Cal

customer_reviews.title: Looooove it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with my spider plant! The color is really dark cherry wood but it still looks great with my decor. Easy to put together and can hold heavy pots with plants.
customer_reviews.author: ChargerBabe

customer_reviews.title: They didn't include the hardware/
customer_reviews.text: The hardware was not included. It took two phone calls and we still have not received satisfaction. Now they are making us take picture and the picture of the instruction than email. I am going to stop payment. Ann Wolters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stand to use as a side table next to a love seat. It's perfect. It's nice and sturdy, well made and the wood is pretty. It took me about 5 min to put it together. For a plant stand, it's sturdy. It's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug567Green

customer_reviews.title: Classic Design
customer_reviews.text: These plant stands truly look rich! They can also be used as end tables.
customer_reviews.author: missreadalot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect! Installation was super easy. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shumika M

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 of these for my foyer and they look wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my foyer and they look wonderful. As other reviewers wrote, the color is more mahogany red vs. cappuccino . . .still worked great for me because they match my floors. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMia

customer_reviews.title: Worth IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a beautiful piece. It is taller than I thought it was looking at the picture. It is almost 3 feet high but the basement heavy and sturdy and keeps it from wobbling even on carpet. It came packed very well, only had a small ding in one of the legs which was easily covered with marker. The top is quite large also about 14 inches across to hold whatever plant, accessories, candles or anything you'd like to put on it. Very well-made piece a great accent to anyone's living room. Well worth the price paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice, inexpensive little table
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, inexpensive little table. The top is large enough to use as something else, maybe an entry table for a lamp. It looks very nice and is sturdy. I put it together in about five minutes... just eight screws.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Sasso

customer_reviews.title: Made well!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very pretty. I love the curved legs on it. Have gotten many compliments. Reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to assemble and blend into our furnitures. I want to buy another one or 2, but they no longer ship in Hawaii. I wish they would deliver again because I would love to have another one.
customer_reviews.author: Laurise Yco

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I damaged a part while assembling and the customer service rep was fantastic in getting me a replacement. This stand is very pretty and is sturdy for my plants.
customer_reviews.author: S & K

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful piece but it was too big for what I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece but it was too big for what I was looking for. Also, the box said one color and the item was another. Just so you know, it is definitely a red cherry color.
customer_reviews.author: cw3

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not stable
customer_reviews.text: This table looks very nice but it is not that sturdy. I am using in my office to hold my modem but I would not put anything breakable on top of this due to stability issues. The table is top heavy and can tip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R. Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sturdy shelf! Perfect for plants or even an end table. Packages easy as well as easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice in the dining room. The finish is flawless and it was easy to assemble. I think this piece is worth the price and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa King

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I open my package I was very disappointed, table look very cheap and half off parts was damaged. I can't send back because of damaged package
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily, looks nice with plants on it
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily, looks nice with plants on it, wish I could find something to fit through the legs for the bottom though. It's pretty narrow.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaK

customer_reviews.title: New Home for a Huge Plant
customer_reviews.text: I have had this huge, 4x4x4, indoor house plant for 30 years, and have become quite attached to it. After its most recent transplant, it weighed about 50 lbs, and its former plant stand would no longer support it. This stand works well in that it not only supports the weight, but also elevates the plant. I am very pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little plant stand/side table
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy side table. Holds a small sculpture. Very easy to assemble and looks like a much more expensive piece. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It is so elegant and nice
customer_reviews.text: The table is much bigger than the picture looks. I love it! It is so elegant and nice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very nice in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: SiL B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this table
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this table, unfortunately, if you turn the screws to much, they poke out on the top and ruin the table. If you don't turn them tight enough, the table is loose.
customer_reviews.author: Auntphoof

customer_reviews.title: Check stability.
customer_reviews.text: Metal cylinder that held leg in base was detached and would not stay in place. All legs were wobbly. Returned for credit. Product was nice looking but had a concern about the stability of it.
customer_reviews.author: cinderlh

customer_reviews.title: very good quality. Takes about 15 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.text: very good quality. Takes about 15 minutes to put together. Veryy easy. Suprised it was so cheap considering the very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Neill

customer_reviews.title: bad product, no instructions - do no buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has no instructions to put it together. It comes with two different sizes of screws and if you put one in the wrong place you will ruin the table top. That's what happened to me. The "wood" is so cheap, it will ruin the wood without effort.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't like to buy these cheap tables but it looked good online so I took a chance. It went together very quickly and easily and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and exceeds my expectation. Very good quality . Looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The plant stand looks great. It looks just as it is presented at ...
customer_reviews.text: The plant stand looks great. It looks just as it is presented at Amazon. I put a tall palm tree plant in a ceramic pot and it was able to handle the weight of the plant.
customer_reviews.author: linda watkins

customer_reviews.title: Missing Chip makes table look cheap and bad
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, but I didn't like the chip out of it that makes it look crappy. I wanted to send it back but it was too much trouble for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Anine Grumbles

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: It had two defectcs, Amazon refundex me the whole amount
customer_reviews.author: mah

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy to Assemble Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my living room. It looks nice and it was easy to assemble. I would buy it again for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for months for a plant stand that would be an attractive attention to my living room. This table has received many compliments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive in person than it actually is.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wood. Looks like my expensive BR furniture. Dark cherry finish. Great corner addition with plant on top.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hensley

customer_reviews.title: A little too tall but nice!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a good quality. However, it is larger than what I thought it was going to be ... my bad for not reading the dimensions close enough. It does look nice in the corner though, so I am happy with it. BTW: It was wrapped WELL. I mean they had three sets of wrappings over it, so very like chance it would be delivered broken or scratched!
customer_reviews.author: dedock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my plant stand, It was very easily assembled, It is sturdy and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: E wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 5 minutes to put together. Only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is the color is not as advertise. They need to change that "Cappuccino" to "Cherry" for the real color.
customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and classy looking, for the money. Easy easy easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: esther in cognito

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I used it for an art project and had a very heavy floral arrangement on it and it held it just fine, plus it was beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality just not match my another furnitures
customer_reviews.text: I thought was black, when I get it, it was wrong color. It's good quality just not match my another furnitures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plant stand looks nice but does not hold very large or heavy plants
customer_reviews.text: The plant stand looks nice but does not hold very large or heavy plants. Is not sturdy enough for anything heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly too
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece just what I was looking for, easy assembly too!
customer_reviews.author: Gastonia, NC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful plant stand. It fits perfectly into a corner. Great cherry finish.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe2

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, better than expected. Top scratches easily. Overall very pleased with sturdiness and design. This is a good value for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wood quality is not good. Received the package damaged.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Larger than I thought. Can be used as a plant stand or telephone table. I would definately recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: screws are not properly packaged and I made a mistake ...
customer_reviews.text: screws are not properly packaged and I made a mistake of using the screws in the wrong hole and thus pierce through the top piece. The two types of screws should be put in two separate mini-zip bags. I bought 2 and one has a top which is pierce through because the screw is too long.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Teo

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a small area.
customer_reviews.text: It was just like in the picture. The quality is wonderful for my needs. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Unstable on carpeting
customer_reviews.text: The stand is very unstable (wobbly) on carpeting. The base is small but quite nice looking so I am adding a larger base under the small one.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: Sold construction, even finish and sturdy. We have a medium sized pot and plant weighting probably 15 pounds and have no worries about tipping or wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: TxF

customer_reviews.title: Pretty piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Pretty piece of furniture. The first one came damaged and they replaced it quickly. Holds a good sized plant nicely.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof6plus2

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: Delivered slightly damaged. The top piece on the edge has an inch-long area where it had been apparently hit, possibly by not having proper packing and dropping. I turned this side to the wall. Not good quality. When assembling, if I turned the screw a little too tight, it cracked the wood.
customer_reviews.author: zan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks nice and sturdy, it's more red than I thought it would be and the finish is polished
customer_reviews.author: Megan B. Mazzucca

product_meta.title: Round Plant Stand Table Cherry
product_meta.description: Graceful curves form an enticing silhouette that infuses charm and romance. This plant stand brings a fresh look to traditional and transitional spaces. With a lovely espresso finish, its cherry wood composition is bold and dynamic. Top with a large potted plant or decor accent, and double up with a smaller pot on its bottom storage shelf. This plant stand creates an artful elegance in any bedroom or living room.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
